item.title: Avicii - Waiting For Love
item.description: For Educational Use Chords: Am, Em, F, G, & Dm

item.title: Avicii - Wake Me Up
item.description: Just Am, F, C, G. This strum pattern is very complicated and fast. Use this link to access the strum practice video (https://youtu.be/CPlUsgAAWA8). Use this link to access the play-along with the syncopated strum at a slower place (https://youtu.be/Hz1tPr_gLNc). Use this link to access the play-along with a simplified strum pattern (https://youtu.be/lEHPJ_bOGbI ).
